name: XXVII
description: A Single player, puzzle, adventure with 2.5 dimensional, pixel art graphics and oblique & orthographic third-person perspective. Solve environmental puzzles to recover the memories of a protagonist who is a god. Explore a fantasy dystopia world that is made of vertically sliced layers. The core idea of XXVII is the simple ability to teleport the character from one designated spot to another across and in-between z-layers.
